sentences.en: So should a respectable bourse be offering the stock?
sentences.cn: 那么,一家可敬的交易所应该发行这只股票 吗 ?

sentences.en: The paris of the restoration at the bourse: a very white colonnade supporting a very smooth frieze ; the whole is square and cost twenty millions.
sentences.cn: 在交易所广场，是复辟时期的巴黎，雪白的列柱支撑着柱顶盘的光滑中楣，整体呈正方形，造价两千万。

sentences.en: The top 40 companies on the Paris bourse have been pulling in record profits.
sentences.cn: 前40强的公司在法国的证券交易所取得了前所未有的利润.

sentences.en: They stormed into the Bourse and set its main hall on fire.
sentences.cn: 他们冲进证券交易所,放火把大厅烧着了.

sentences.en: Until then, Shanghai's bubbly bourse will likely remain what it is today: an internal affair.
sentences.cn: 在这之前, 上海充满泡沫的股票交易所将保持今天的样子: 国内事件.

sentences.en: You can open countless capital account in different bourse.
sentences.cn: 你可以在不同的交易所开设无数个资金账户.

trans.tran_cn: （非英语国家，尤指法国的）股票交易所
trans.tran_en: The bourse of a European city or region is its stock exchange
